ch.hevs.isi.field

Class ModbusAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hevs.isi.field.ModbusAccessor

  • public class ModbusAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create a ModBus link and Write/Read a float or a boolean value
